stories.text:
Do you love tech? but hate tech interviews with a passion.

It really rubs my fucking rhubarb the wrong way, when I am in a technical interview and the interviewer starts asking me random assessed questions, either technical or personality type ones.

I understand they have to ask something in a interview but its the questions in of themselves that they choose that has me hanging the phone up on their hot ear.

After years in the industry I have come to the conclusion I am actually unemployable! I am crankier than bag of cats!

Where can i get a job as a programmer where class A assholes can apply?
stories.title: Ask HN: Where can you apply for a programming job when you are a Class A asshole
